title: Microsoft Sculpt Ergonomic Keyboard Review -- After One Year
description:
Here is a quick review of the Microsoft Sculpt Ergonomic Keyboard.
I purchased it one year ago and have used it for almost ten hours per day everyday.
It's worth the money, but just has a few small flaws.

asset.author: Christopher Pecoraro
